data.text: @gchwood @FeelinFilmAaron @TheWrap @peoplescrtic The criminal that answers a knock on the door to the house he is supposed to be robbing???

@FeelinFilmAaron @TheWrap @peoplescrtic Responding to a crime in progress, gun drawn is SOP.  They put away the guns, when they knew that there was no crime being committed.  This happens regardless of race, police don't know what a potential criminal is carrying on the other side of the door.
@TheWrap @KNX1070 Since when do police provide addresses from complaining neighbors???  🙄
@TheWrap Dear Media Folk, we will NEVER go read or play audio of the full story. It's the worst marketing ploy. I shall go about my day not knowing the ending to your story. @TheWrap

@TheWrap @peoplescrtic When did "break in" equate to having a gun pointed at the door when you knock? Our police don't know how to operate under the use of force continuum anymore. They need to be held accountable, as does the person making a false accusation (a neighbor doesn't know he lives there?)
@pourmecoffee @TheWrap Well played sir... Well played indeed https://t.co/hSfjmr7sce
